snippet: Victor Rodman was sentenced to 90 days in jail for beating a Rikers Island inmate, who sustained a broken nose and lost vision in one eye.
abstract: Former New York City Correction Officer Victor Rodman is sentenced to 90 days in jail for beating of Rikers Island inmate Carlos Sanchez in 2009 that cost Sanchez his vision in one eye.
lead_paragraph: Victor Rodman was sentenced to 90 days in jail for beating a Rikers Island inmate, who sustained a broken nose and lost vision in one eye.

headline.main: Ex-Rikers Guard Sentenced to Jail in Attack on Inmate Causing Vision Loss
headline.print_headline: Ex-Rikers Guard Sentenced to Jail in Inmate Attack
